properties.entry: SELECT events.*,places.* FROM events,places WHERE events.id_place = places.id_place ORDER BY events.id_event
SELECT events.*,places.* FROM events,places WHERE events.id_event= ? AND events.id_place = places.id_place
SELECT seats_available FROM events WHERE id_event = ?
SELECT events.*, places.*, museum.* FROM events, places, museum WHERE events.id_place = places.id_place AND places.id_place=museum.id_place
SELECT events.*, places.*, zoo.* FROM events, places, zoo WHERE events.id_place = places.id_place AND places.id_place=zoo.id_place

SELECT events.*, places.*, stadium.* FROM events, places, stadium WHERE events.id_place = places.id_place AND places.id_place=stadium.id_place

SELECT events.*, places.*, traditional_market.* FROM events, places, traditional_market WHERE events.id_place = places.id_place AND places.id_place=traditional_market.id_place
SELECT * FROM events_users WHERE events_users.id_user = ?
SELECT events.*,places.* FROM events,places WHERE events.id_place=places.id_place AND id_event IN (SELECT id_event FROM events_users WHERE id_user=?)

select * from users where username = ? and password =?
SELECT * FROM users WHERE email LIKE ? OR username LIKE ? OR dni LIKE ?
SELECT * FROM events_users WHERE id_event = ? AND id_user = ?
SELECT * FROM events_users WHERE id_event = ?
SELECT * FROM events_users WHERE id_user = ?
update users set password = ? where id_user = ?
update users set firstname = ?, lastname = ?, dni = ?, email = ?, phone_number = ?, address = ? where id_user = ?
update events set name_event= ?, description_event=?, start_event=?, end_event=?,type_event=?,ticket_price=?,seats_available=?,seats_total=?,id_place=? WHERE id_event = ?
update events set seats_available = seats_available+1 WHERE id_event = ?
update events set seats_available = seats_available-1 WHERE id_event = ?
update places set id_type_place=?, name_place=?, capacity=?, description_place=?, start_time=?, end_time=?, zone=?, image=?, is_building=? WHERE id_place = ?
UPDATE places SET image = ? "+" WHERE placeId = ?
delete from events where id_event=?
delete from places where id_place=?
delete from users where id_user=?
delete from events_users where id_events_users=?
delete from events_users where id_user=?
delete from events_users where id_event=?
DELETE FROM id_events_users WHERE id_event = ? AND id_user = ?
